pages.body: What IBM and our clients can achieve together-laid out in a common frame

target.subtitle: Innovate more than products and services-innovate to reinvent your business.

items.title: What it means
items.body: The influence of cloud permeates organizational cultures, driving a radical rethinking of how business leaders approach their roles and, ultimately, how work gets done. Cloud can speed access to trusted information and insights, ease collaboration, and enable the relentless pursuit of better business outcomes.

items.title: Who Benefits
items.body:
C-suite
Product management
Enterprise architects
Application developers

questions.text: Is your organizational culture open to reinvention?
How does your infrastructure enable agility to support rapid changes to processes and systems?
How has your senior leadership demonstrated commitment to continuous top-down and bottom-up innovation?
What degree of expertise and acumen does your workforce have to imagine and implement change?
How might cloud technologies change the way you work with partners and suppliers?

target.subtitle: Deepen knowledge of customers, partners, suppliers and processes

items.title: What it means
items.body: As new technologies create new types and sources of data, leaders are using analytics to inform and empower workers to seize emerging opportunities. Through cloud-based analytics, business users can deepen their understanding of customers, competitors and the complete value chain.

items.title: Who Benefits
items.body:
Sales
Customer service
Procurement
Supply chain
Merchandising
Human resources

questions.text: What have you done to enable your organization to deliver services that anticipate customer needs?
What insights do you know are out there in the data, if only you could bring together and analyze the right data?
What could your organization do differently if business users had self-service access to analytics applications in the cloud?
What steps has your organization taken to integrate its analytics and cloud strategies?
What are you doing to enable your organization to anticipate customer needs?

target.subtitle: Improve business processes and security, and enhance agility and responsiveness

items.title: What it means
items.body: As requirements change, opportunities are identified or threats arise, it must be ready. In the competitive marketplace, advantage will go to those who can adapt instantly-dynamically consuming and delivering critical capabilities through the right combination of public, private and hybrid clouds.

items.title: Who Benefits
items.body:
Procurement
Supply chain
Merchandising
Marketing
It
Human resources

questions.text: What are you not able to deliver through the cloud?
How far along are you in using a variety of cloud models-public, private and hybrid?
How do you determine where to run a given process or application from a business and technology perspective?
Which cloud-based business solutions and services are you currently using? Why those?
What appeals to you most about cloud services? What concerns do you have?
